prompt: Create an image of a woman, rendered in dramatic chiaroscuro against a vibrant red backdrop. The woman is primarily silhouetted in deep black, with only her eyes and the area immediately surrounding them illuminated by a thin band of warm, reddish light. Her hair is styled in a neat bun on top of her head. The lighting should create an atmosphere of mystery and intensity, emphasizing the gaze of the woman. The overall style should evoke a sense of modern artistry.
author: 6vidit9

prompt: Фотореалистичное ультра детализированное изображение. Картинная галерея, в которой утонченные ценители искусства с умным видом разглядывают экспонаты, но вместо всех картин в красивых резных рамках находится красное загруженное изображение. На стене под потолком написано название выставки CivitAI Art Exhibition с синей эмблемой со второго изображения.
author: 0B0Rmot

prompt: Cinematic dark-fantasy character shot, ultra-detailed: a gaunt bald goblin/vampire-like creature crouched low on a ruined stone staircase, three-quarter view, body coiled like a predator ready to spring. Pale waxy skin with veins and wrinkles, sharp hooked nose, sunken cheeks, thin cruel smile, glowing wary eyes; long pointed ears with reddish inner tint. Hands are oversized with elongated fingers and black claw-like nails, one hand hanging forward, the other bracing on the step; knuckles bony, tendons and skin folds sharply defined. Wardrobe: shredded dark cloak/robe draped around the shoulders and arms, heavy worn fabric with frayed edges and holes, layered folds casting deep shadows; thin straps and patches of grime, dust stuck to the hem. Environment: steep broken stone steps with chipped edges, cracks, rubble fragments, soot and damp stains; background fades into foggy sepia-gray haze with faint architectural silhouettes. Lighting: soft overcast light from above-left, subtle warm bounce from below, strong chiaroscuro in folds, gentle rim light outlining head and shoulders; drifting dust motes, faint mist. Camera: low angle, 35–50mm look, shallow depth of field with face and leading hand razor sharp, background softened, cinematic HDR contrast, subtle bloom on highlights, fine film grain, 8k, no text, no logo, no watermark.
author: Alexia_Rousse

prompt: Cinematic ultra-photorealistic macro: an outstretched human hand held palm-up in a cold blue-grey void, shallow depth of field. The palm and fingers are coated in fine frost-like dust and gritty particles, skin pores and creases sharply visible, tiny ice crystals clinging to knuckles. Hovering just above the center of the palm: a miniature swirling vortex/black-hole, a perfectly dark circular core with a spiraling funnel of smoke, powder and mist being pulled inward; the spiral texture is granular like sand and ash, with clear rotational motion frozen mid-frame. A trail of glowing golden sparks and glittering embers arcs around the vortex like fireflies, scattering into the air; micro-bokeh particles float in the background. Lighting: cool moody rim light outlining the hand, soft diffuse fill, subtle specular highlights on dust grains; strong contrast between the pitch-black core and illuminated particles. Slight motion blur on the outer swirl, razor focus on the vortex rim and nearest fingertips, cinematic film still, subtle bloom, fine film grain, ultra-detailed 8k, no text, no logo, no watermark.
author: Alexia_Rousse

prompt:
An ultra-realistic dynamic action scene set atop a storm-swept snowy mountain ridge, capturing a massive white tiger mid-charge as it thunders forward through deep alpine snow. The camera sits low to the ground with a slight forward tracking angle, amplifying the sensation of speed and impact as snow explodes outward in frozen arcs.
The white tiger is anatomically powerful and grounded in realism â muscular shoulders rolling beneath dense winter fur, massive forepaws extended with claws partially unsheathed as they tear into compacted snow. Individual strands of thick white fur are sharply defined, layered and slightly clumped from frost, with subtle pale gray striping flowing naturally along its body. Ice crystals cling to whiskers and outer fur, catching sharp highlights. Its amber eyes burn with fierce focus, ears pinned back against the wind, jaws open in a roar that reveals curved ivory fangs. Dense vapor bursts from its mouth, trailing behind in turbulent clouds as it charges.
Riding atop the tiger is a battle-ready snowman warrior sculpted entirely from tightly packed snow, now equipped with fully formed arms and legs made of compacted snow rather than sticks. His body consists of three main snow spheres seamlessly fused together, but from the torso extend sculpted snow arms with defined elbows and rounded forearms. His hands are formed from compressed snow with distinct finger shapes â slightly squared and textured, edges rough and crystalline, flexed tightly around the reins. His snow legs straddle the tigerâs back, bent naturally at the knees, packed firmly to suggest stability despite the motion.
The snow surface across his body is highly detailed â granular ice crystals compacted together with subtle irregularities, micro-reflections sparkling under cold light. Small fragments chip away from his limbs due to the violent motion, trailing powder behind him. His coal eyes are matte black with porous texture embedded deep into his head. A vivid orange carrot nose protrudes forward, fibrous and slightly frosted. His coal mouth is stretched wide in an unrestrained battle cry, conveying fierce determination.
One snow hand grips tightly onto frost-coated leather reins, which are pulled taut as the tiger surges forward. The other snow arm is raised high into the air, snow fingers clenched into a powerful fist. Snow particles scatter from his raised arm, emphasizing movement and energy.
The mountain landscape is vast and dramatic â jagged peaks loom through swirling snowfall, layered in atmospheric haze. Snow gusts streak diagonally across the frame in motion blur, while deep tracks carve violently into the terrain beneath the tigerâs paws. The sky is heavy with storm clouds in layered steel-gray and icy blue tones.
Lighting is cinematic and high-contrast â cold diffused daylight mixed with directional shafts breaking through cloud cover. A sharp rim light outlines the tigerâs fur and the snowmanâs sculpted limbs, separating them from the blizzard-like backdrop. The key light accentuates crystalline snow textures and fur detail without flattening the forms. Shot with a wide anamorphic lens to exaggerate speed and scale, shallow depth of field keeps the tigerâs face and the snowmanâs raised fist in crisp focus while distant peaks blur dynamically. Subtle film grain, restrained chromatic aberration along high-contrast snow edges, and faint lens flare enhance realism.
Color grading emphasizes icy blues, cool whites, and steel grays, contrasted by the bright orange carrot nose and deep black coal features. The mood is epic, intense, and heroically surreal â a high-speed fantasy battle charge rendered with photorealistic detail and kinetic cinematic energy.
masterpiece, best quality, ultra-detailed textures, 8k resolution, professional colour grading, high dynamic range, photorealistic cinematic fantasy, ultra-realistic fur and snow detail, dynamic action composition

prompt: Ultra-cinematic dark fantasy portrait of a towering mummy-like humanoid wrapped in layered, tattered linen bandages, 3/4 profile facing left, shoulders and upper torso filling the frame. The face is mostly swallowed by shadow under a hood of torn wraps; only two molten-gold eyes burn through the darkness with sharp catchlights and subtle bloom, a hint of cracked charcoal skin and faint teeth barely visible. Bandages rendered with extreme detail: frayed fibers, holes, dust and sand grit, stretched folds, loose strips whipping in a hot wind, dramatic fabric flow. Background: thick rolling smoke clouds and ash haze, warm amber backlight behind the figure creating a strong rim glow along the bandage edges, cooler gray smoke in the shadows. Composition: subject anchored left-center, head near upper third, broad negative space of smoke to the right for scale; clean silhouette readability. Lighting: high-contrast cinematic backlight with soft front fill, deep blacks in the hood, glowing highlights on fabric texture, volumetric light shafts cutting through smoke, fine film grain, subtle vignette. Camera/optics: 85mm portrait look, f/2.0, shallow depth of field with focus on the glowing eyes and nearest bandage texture, background softly blurred; 8k detail, no text, no watermark, no logos.
author: Alexia_Rousse

prompt: Ultra-cinematic realistic fantasy scene, vertical frame: a small hooded wizard creature with a faceless shadow-void head and two round glowing golden eyes stands in an ancient cathedral-like library, holding an open spellbook toward the camera. He wears a deep red robe and oversized pointed hat with a leather buckle, a wrapped scarf covering the lower face area, and layered trim with embroidered patterns; fabric weave, dust, and frayed edges rendered in extreme detail. The spellbook is heavy and worn with cracked leather binding, gilded page edges, ink diagrams and sigils that remain abstract and non-readable; blue-white arcane lightning and sparkling particles burst from the pages, wrapping around his sleeves and drifting into the air. Environment: towering stone arches, shelves of old books, hundreds of candles on both sides casting warm flickering light; a large gothic window behind reveals a bright full moon, cool blue moonlight mixing with warm candlelight; floating dust motes and ember-like sparks. Composition: centered character, book in the lower center foreground as focal point, strong depth with leading lines of shelves toward the window. Lighting: warm tungsten practicals + cool moon rim, high contrast, subtle bloom on magic sparks and eye glow, fine film grain, volumetric haze. prompt: Ultra-realistic dark epic fantasy cinematic video, vertical 9:16, 4K/8K, HDR, volumetric lighting, heavy fog, dramatic atmosphere. 0–2s Fade in from black. Ancient fog-covered graveyard at night. Crooked tombstones, dead trees, dense dark forest behind. Full-body necromancer cat stands in the center wearing a long, tattered black hooded robe with bone charms and occult accessories. His pupils are almost completely black. Subtle green glow flickers from below. Wind lightly moves his cloak and the fog. 2–5s Close-up as the cat opens an ancient glowing Necronomicon. The book erupts with intense toxic green light. Arcane runes spiral upward. Green magical smoke swirls around him. Floating glyphs rotate in the air. Light illuminates his face from below, creating deep dramatic shadows. 5–7s Slow-motion moment. He slams his staff (topped with a mouse skull with glowing green eyes) into the ground. Impact: * Circular green shockwave bursts outward. * Ground cracks open with glowing green fractures. * Dark mist explodes outward. * Magical particles scatter through the air. 7–10s Camera quickly pulls back and slightly upward. Multiple graves begin breaking apart. Skeletal cat claws burst from the soil. Several skeletal cats rise halfway out of their graves. Their eye sockets burn with bright green light. Final wide epic shot: Necromancer cat in the foreground, skeletal army emerging behind him through fog, green energy veins spreading across the graveyard. Hold for dramatic dark fantasy finish. Ultra-detailed textures, realistic cloth physics, bone detail, cinematic depth of field, epic lighting, volumetric fog, high contrast, forbidden ancient magic atmosphere.

prompt:
A modern fantasy comic book cover illustrated in a clean, sharp, highly textured digital-painterly style — vibrant, dynamic, and character-focused, blending the dramatic lighting and painterly realism of Arcane with the expressive exaggeration and bold energy of Hearthstone splash art. The composition is punchy, colorful, and instantly readable, with strong silhouette design and exaggerated expressions for comedic impact.
Front and center stands an utterly overwhelmed young battle-mage, robes half-buttoned and slightly singed, holding a glowing spellbook upside down as chaotic magic erupts around him. His hair is wild and wind-swept from an arcane explosion, and his wide-eyed expression screams, “This was NOT in the tutorial.” One hand crackles with unstable neon-blue lightning, while the other desperately tries to swat away a tiny floating imp that’s yanking at his hood.
Beside him, leaning casually against a cracked stone pillar, is his unimpressed companion — a towering orc barbarian in bright, over-the-top heroic armor, arms crossed, eyebrow raised, completely untouched by the magical disaster unfolding inches away. His axe rests on his shoulder, and he’s sipping tea from a comically delicate porcelain cup as fireballs whiz past. His expression reads: “I told you not to touch it.”
In the background, the fantasy city street is in shambles: a magically animated broom is aggressively chasing a terrified guard, a potion shop sign is spinning wildly after being struck by stray magic, and a portal has opened midair — but instead of something terrifying emerging, an annoyed goose is stepping through, glowing with ominous arcane energy.
The title text is bold and stylized at the top, metallic with glowing magical cracks running through it. Magical energy swirls around the lettering, interacting with the characters — sparks bouncing off armor edges and casting vibrant rim-lighting.
The color palette is saturated and playful: electric blues, hot magentas, warm oranges, and punchy emerald greens. Lighting is dramatic but crisp — strong rim lights, glowing spell effects, soft bloom around magical elements, and clean high-contrast shadows that enhance depth without muddiness. Every surface is richly textured: brushed steel armor, woven cloth fibers, glowing magical glyphs, cracked cobblestones, drifting embers, and expressive facial details rendered in high fidelity.
The overall composition is energetic and humorous, capturing a moment of magical chaos frozen at its peak — a cover that promises action, comedy, and fantasy mishaps in equal measure.
Bold, character-driven, vibrant, and mischievously epic — a modern fantasy comic cover that feels alive with motion and personality. 2:3
